content: Anatomy of a Forum Thread Public Relations By: Rand Fishkin September 29, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. By: Rand Fishkin September 29, 2005 Anatomy of a Forum Thread Public Relations The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Kim Krause Berg posted a hilarious topic over at Cre8asite on the subject of a forum thread on light bulb changing. Naturally, her fellow SEO forum members chipped in with their own personal takes on the post and managed to turn it into a perfect example of Kim's joke... Enjoy folks, this may be one of the few times you'll actually see me flame someone in a thread. Copied! Back to Top
